name: Yeti
description: A large, white-furred creature adapted to snowy environments, the Yeti is strong and has a commanding presence.
memorable: Its Chilling Gaze can paralyze foes, making it a formidable predator in its icy habitat.
goals: The Yeti hunts in cold climates, using its camouflage and ambush tactics to capture prey.
relations: Often encountered alongside other cold-related creatures in mountainous or snowy regions.
environment: Primarily found in snowy, mountainous areas.
strengths: Immune to cold damage and has a powerful gaze attack that can paralyze enemies.
weaknesses: Vulnerable to fire damage, which rattles it, reducing its effectiveness in combat.
attacks: Utilizes claw attacks that deal slashing damage and a gaze attack that inflicts paralysis and cold damage.
most_powerful_ability: Chilling Gaze, causing paralysis and cold damage to unsuspecting foes.
senses: Possesses a passive Perception of 13, indicating decent awareness of its surroundings.
skills: Excels in Perception and Stealth, making it an effective ambusher in its snowy environment.
additional_information: Has advantage on Stealth checks in snowy terrain due to Camouflage.
Vision is unaffected by harsh weather, thanks to Storm Sight.
Possesses a strong physical build with high Strength.
Charismatic nature aids in social interactions despite low Intelligence.
Can easily traverse both snowy ground and vertical surfaces.
test_queries: large snow monster with paralyzing gaze
white-furred creature that excels in icy environments
ambush predator that is immune to cold
monster with fire vulnerability and camouflage
